title: are the servers dying? what's goin on
body: the last minute or so of the game i just played, everyone had massive ping spikes, now i keep disconnecting from the client, i dont really wanna play ranked till this is resolved

replies.body: I'm not seeing any widespread issues at the moment, but I'm curious if this might have happened from some type of packet loss as well since I'm seeing so much of it lately. Grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) for me and run a trace to the NA server at 104.160.131.1. Post those results here so I can take a look for ya!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nhdd85b5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-18T23:54:54.326+0000)
>
> I'm not seeing any widespread issues at the moment, but I'm curious if this might have happened from some type of packet loss as well since I'm seeing so much of it lately. Grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) for me and run a trace to the NA server at 104.160.131.1. Post those results here so I can take a look for ya!

my internet is fine right now, I looked at the results after 100 pings, it seems fine.
if i experience packet loss on that level again i'll immediately run winMTR and drop resultos here. (or if i can dm, but it's not a huge deal)
